diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Anthropological Linguistics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    AnthropologicalLinguistics[Anthropological Linguistics] --> Design[Interface Design]
    AnthropologicalLinguistics --> Components[UI Components]
    AnthropologicalLinguistics --> Patterns[Design Patterns]
    Design --> Layout[Layout Design]
    Design --> Visual[Visual Design]
    Components --> Buttons[Buttons & Controls]
    Components --> Navigation[Navigation]
    Patterns --> Material[Material Design]
    Patterns --> Flat[Flat Design]
